entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is described as marching past with a large roll of parchment and a handful of spare quills, indicating he is a student or someone who carries writing materials. He is also mentioned to be going back to Hogwarts, which suggests he is a student at the school.

entities.name: mr weasley
entities.description: Mr. Weasley is described as noticing Harry but giving no sign that he has noticed him, indicating he is a parent or guardian of Harry's. He is also mentioned to be taking Harry back to tell the others the good news, suggesting he is in charge of communicating with other family members.

entities.name: percy
entities.description: Percy is described as disappearing up the stairs to the ninth level, indicating he is a member of the Weasley family and possibly a sibling of Harry's.

relationships.description: Mr. Weasley is described as taking care of Harry, indicating a parent-child relationship between them.
Percy and Harry are both members of the Weasley family, suggesting they are siblings.
